Our Team: Our organisation is backed by a diligent team of professionals whose diligence and hard work have made us capable of carving a niche in the industry. After a rigorous assessment of skills, knowledge and experience, we have hired these professionals.

Our Infrastructure: The highly advanced and state-of-the-art infrastructural set-up of our organisation makes us capable of timely delivering a premium quality range of Led lights to the clients. multiblitz-usa-studio-lighting-for-photo.overview:
Multiblitz - Revolutionizing Photography since 1948

Multiblitz Dr. Ing. D.A. Mannesmann GmbH was founded by inventor and entrepreneur Dr. Mannesmann in 1948 in Cologne, Germany, and is one of the worlds leading manufacturers of state-of-the-art photography lighting equipment. The first ever Multiblitz strobe, in fact the first German electronic flash unit ever, was the Multiblitz I built in 1948. Dr. Mannesmann decided to build high-quality photographic lighting equipment and strobes that can flash multiple times. Hence he named the strobe and subsequently the brand Multiblitz after Harold “Doc” Edgerton’s multi-flash experiments from the late 40s (Blitz is German for flash). In the 50s and 60s strobes like the Multiblitz Reporter II and the Multiblitz Press Universal were extremely popular among press photographers. Since 1973, Multiblitz has been managed by visionary engineer and CEO Hans-Gerd Wulms and has grown to become one of the world’s leading manufacturers for premium studio lighting and photography lighting equipment. Under Wulms, Multiblitz forever changed the studio lighting world when it introduced the industry’s first compact and portable studio light, the now legendary Mini-Studio 202 in 1976. Since then, Wulms and Multiblitz are accountable for many inventions and products in photography lighting that were well ahead of their time including the most successful Profilite and Variolite monolight strobes, and the famed Profilux (now Profilux Classic) studio light with its lightweight yet rugged design and peak performance in the 90s. Today, a broad range of Multiblitz photography lighting equipment is used by leading professional photographers around the world and all aspects of modern photography. With over 65 years of experience in developing premium lighting equipment, Multiblitz is the most experienced manufacturer for photography lighting equipment in the world. We take pride in the fact that we are the only European brand that is solely manufacturing award-winning products in Germany. Multiblitz USA

Multiblitz USA was founded in 2010 to establish a permanent presence of the Multiblitz brand in North America. For the first time, Multiblitz products are available to consumers in the US and Canada directly from the manufacturer at the Multiblitz USA online store that was launched in 2011. The store provides North American photographers the chance to easily experience award-winning photography lighting products with the convenience of ordering directly online – just a click away! This new strategy guarantees a customer friendly pricing structure and improved service by a new team dedicated to deliver the best possible Multiblitz experience. We are approaching the US market with new 110V and multi-voltage studio lights that deliver premium quality and highest reliability. The recent success of the award winning Profilux Plus monolight system (named Best Flash System: TIPA Award 2010) and the recently introduced Profilux (Profilux ECO outside the US) shows that we are on the right track to continue the unparalleled international Multiblitz success of the past. In addition to pursue growth on a national level through online sales, we are building relationships with local photographers in the DelMarVa region. If you are interested in getting a presentation of our photography lighting products or want to schedule a full-on demo photo shoot, please get in touch with us: info@multiblitzusa.com

Read more: http://multiblitzusa.com/about-us/#ixzz2UiALSUij
multiblitz-usa-studio-lighting-for-photo.name: Multiblitz USA - Studio Lighting for Photography

lighting-retrofit-international.overview:
LRI is a national energy services contracting firm that primarily serves the Energy Service Company (ESCo) community, providing state-of-the-art innovations in energy conservation, development and construction. Lighting Retrofit International, LLC provides turnkey energy services with meticulous attention to customer requirements and expectations while allowing the ESCo customer to minimize their involvement in individual energy conservation processes, meet contractual obligations and provide strong customer service.

LRI specializes in teaming with the national ESCo community to assist them in winning competitive solicitations in various arenas including the Energy Savings Performance Contract (ESPC) market, Area Wide performance contracting, IDIQ’s as well as private industry; which includes utilization of utility rebates and EPAC incentives.

Lighting Retrofit International, LLC provides lighting and water building efficiency services to Government, institutional, and commercial customers. The company provides project management, lighting and maintenance savings analytics, and construction auditing and designing services. Lighting Retrofit International, LLC was incorporated in 2009 and is based in Gambrills, Maryland.

light-relief.overview:
Light Relief uses LED technology to direct a stream of warm light into tissues in order to increase circulation and relieve pain.

The product consists of a hand-held base unit and a flexible pad. The base unit houses the main circuitry, a graphic display, button controls and batteries. The pad contains the LEDs – 24 infrared, 31 red and 4 blue.

Light Relief also allows users to turn the heat setting on and off, as well as change between four light frequency settings.

About Our Lamps

the-bike-light-shop.overview:
With an one of the largest ranges of manufacturers including Smart, Cateye, Knog, Oxford Products, Exposure Lights, Niterider, Bicygnals, Sigma Sport and Union, the site caters for all cyclists and offers suggested products for commuters, mountain bikers, long distance endurance cyclists and occasional cyclists alike. All the products on offer are rated by the Bike Light Shop – but nothing scores less than 6/10 because otherwise they wouldn’t stock it!

The site also includes a glossary aimed at helping users understand the terminology of bike light manufacturers e.g. how to determine how bright lights really are when manufacturers use different terms – Lux, Lumens, Watts, Candelas etc. Users are also asked to send in further information to the glossary section which could help others.

The creators of the site felt that there was little real help for cyclists in the area of bike lights and that most online retailers simply hosted/sold the products and left people to make their own decisions based on price alone.

The Bike Light Shop was founded in the summer of 2010 by Simon Bever, a 47 year old marketer with 25 years of experience of online and offline marketing; a lifelong cyclist with tens of thousands of miles of touring, commuting and racing under his belt.

The site description states;

‘The ultimate guide to bike lights for commuters, mountain-bikers, long distance and everyday cyclists - Low prices and FREE UK delivery.’ Specialties

Bike Lights, Commuting by Bicycle, Audax UK, Time Trials

wham-city-lights.overview:
Wham City Lights – from the developers of the Dan Deacon App – turns the audience’s smartphones into hand-held lighting effects for any concert or event. The app syncs every phone in the room, so that they flash simultaneously and change color in response to the music.

You program a light show using our intuitive web-based light show editor, and the audience does the rest – they just open the app and hold up their phones. The result is a totally unique concert environment and an unforgettable event. No wi-fi or data necessary!

We are a Baltimore-based, musician-run tech startup that has successfully created a product that is revolutionizing audience participation at live events. Our app allows bands, sports teams, and other event organizers to create custom, synced “app light shows” at live events.

In the first year of our company, more than 1 million audience members have attended a Wham City Lights event. We toured with Brad Paisley and have appeared at Lincoln Center, the Billboard Music Awards, the Catalyst Conference, CMA Fest, Intel Sales & Marketing Conference, America’s Got Talent, and many more events.
wham-city-lights.name: Wham City Lights

For all you coffee addicts, experience the authenticity of a real Italian coffee at La Bottega or the well-known favourite of Starbucks.

The Light is also home to Vue Cinema, so why not catch a movie and a bite to eat at the same time? As part of The Light’s ‘Delight Wednesday’ promotion you can also enjoy some great restaurant deals on production of your Vue cinema ticket. Click here for more information.

With the likes of Ark, Dolls Boutique, O’Neill, Music Room and Fabrication, we’ve got an attractive balance of independent and high street retailers.

What’s more, we have a Radisson Blu 4 star hotel, a Virgin Active health & fitness club, Predator Nutrition, Hanalee salon, One Medicare GP surgery and one of the Leeds’ safest car parks, all under one roof!

astera-led-technology.overview:
Astera manufactures a complete range of LED fixtures and controllers, and are the market leaders for ambient wireless lighting.

Astera-LED Technology was founded in Germany in 2007. Astera’s core engineers and management team have been operating in the LED lighting business since 2003 and have been working at the forefront of innovation ever since.

Astera is the leading manufacturer of wireless LED fixtures and controllers for event lighting. In addition, the company has developed several outstanding LED lightsources and controllers for architectural lighting. Furthermore, the company designs and manufactures LED lights for other US and European companies.

Astera’s young and dynamic R&D team is specialized in developing embedded LED control systems and advanced LED lights. An outstanding R&D team, with the support of an experienced management team, means that Astera is constantly asserting on all markets that are sensitive to innovations of the LED lighting business.

Based on our global network of partners and suppliers, Astera pulls together the competences for helping customers to find the optimal LED solutions for their specific needs. The company is co-working with experienced and reliable companies in the LED business which are involved in the latest technologies worldwide. Astera is providing its customers with LED controllers for various interfaces, like DMX-512 wireless radio-control and Ethernet.

For special needs and exclusive projects Astera is developing customized or completely new LED solutions. With a team of dedicated engineers, a work facility, and QC management in Southern China, Astera has developed a strong and effective set-up for quickly developing new solutions. Before actual development of the LED product begins, Astera provides its customers with light simulations which are showing how illuminated objects will finally appear.

ledengin.overview:
LED Engin, Inc., based in California’s Silicon Valley, specializes in ultra-bright, ultra compact solid state lighting solutions allowing lighting designers & engineers the freedom to create uncompromised yet energy efficient lighting experiences. The LuxiGen™ Platform — an emitter and lens combination or integrated module solution, delivers superior flexibility in light output, ranging from 3w to 90w, a wide spectrum of available colors, including whites, multi-color and UV, and the ability to deliver upwards of 5,000 high quality lumens to a target. The small size combined with powerful output allows for a previously unobtainable freedom of design wherever high-flux density, directional light is required. LedEngin’s packaging technologies lead the industry with products that feature lowest thermal resistance, highest flux density and consummate reliability, enabling compact and efficient solid state lighting solutions.

LedEngin is committed to providing products that conserve natural resources and reduce greenhouse emissions.

eletus-led.overview:
Eletus LED is growing by leaps and bounds since the time it came into being in the year 2009. Our company is manufacturing, supplying, trading and exporting a the wide range of SMD Flexible Strip Lights, LED Track Lights, LED Bulbs, LED Lights, LED Underwater Lights, LED Street Lights, LED Flood Lights, LED Tube Lights, RGB Amplifiers, LED RGB Controllers and LED Down Lights.

Our Vendor Base: We are addressing the varied demands of clients in an efficient manner, because of the support of our vendors. We have maintained friendly relation with our clients. We select our vendors after judging them on various factors based upon the quality they deliver, timing of delivery of consignments and many more.

Our Vision: Under mentioned is the list of our Vision: To offer excellent quality products Execution of every product order within the scheduled time frames Offering nothing less than the most cost effective products To cater as per the exacting requirements of our esteemed customers Welcoming customers’ feedback and suggestions to improvise on the products consistently

Our Quality: We sincerely focus on the quality of our range and make sure that products that delivered in our brand name, withstand the prescribed quality norms along with the customer’s expectations. In order to ensure premium quality in our ranhttp://www.indiamart.com/eletusled/
